projects.name: Chimmuni
projects.title: Chimmuni – Child Immunization & Vaccination Schedule Management System
projects.description: A mobile system that helps parents track child immunization records and receive automated reminders for upcoming vaccinations.
projects.overview: Chimmuni is a digital health platform designed to simplify the management of child immunization records. It allows parents and guardians to track vaccination schedules, receive timely reminders, view immunization history, and maintain accurate records in one place. By replacing the traditional clinic booklet, the app ensures that no vaccination is missed and provides easy access to health information whenever needed.
keyFeatures: Digital storage of child immunization records
Alerts for overdue or missed immunizations
Complete vaccination schedule based on national guidelines
techStackDet: Firebase Realtime Database for data storage
Firebase Authentication for secure user login
Firebase Cloud Messaging for reminders and alerts
myRole: Integrated Firebase services for backend functionality
results: Improved timely vaccination and reduced missed appointments
Digitized child health records for easy access
Enhanced communication between caregivers and health facilities

projects.name: TeaPlus
projects.title: TeaPlus – Employee-Based Tea Production Tracking App
projects.description: A simple mobile app used to record and track daily tea leaves production per employee.
projects.overview: TeaPlus is an efficient production tracking system designed for businesses that rely on daily tea collection from employees. The app enables field supervisors or clerks to record tea weights, maintain employee production logs, and calculate daily or weekly totals automatically. It eliminates manual book entries, reduces errors, and provides instant access to historical production data.
techStackDet: Firebase Realtime Database for storing production records
Material Design for a clean UI
myRole: Designed UI optimized for quick daily entries
Implemented production recording and history logic
results: Simplified daily tea production record keeping
Eliminated manual books and reduced entry errors
Enabled quick access to historical production trends

projects.name: AlphaApp Dairy
projects.title: AlphaApp Dairy – Digital Dairy Management System
projects.description: A dairy management app for recording daily milk production and calculating farmer payments.
projects.overview: AlphaApp Dairy is a streamlined dairy record management system that enables dairy administrators and farmers to maintain accurate daily milk logs, calculate payments, and analyze production trends. By combining modern UI with accurate record management, the app eliminates traditional inconsistencies found in paper records and promotes better transparency in dairy operations.
keyFeatures: Editable entries and clean data history
Real-time data access through cloud storage
techStackDet: Firebase Realtime Database for storing dairy data
MPAndroidChart for visual analytics and graphs
Material Design Components for interface design
myRole: Designed intuitive dashboards and data-entry workflows
Implemented milk recording logic and payment calculations
Connected the app to Firebase for data storage
results: Provided farmers with transparent access to production and payments
Enabled real-time management of dairy operations
